hero_subtitle: A secure, open-source platform where you can receive anonymous questions and connect with others while keeping your identity protected.
why_pemblle_desc: Built with privacy and security at its core. Your identity is always protected.
feature_anonymous_desc: Send and receive messages without revealing your identity. Your privacy is our top priority.
feature_secure_desc: Your data is encrypted and protected. We never share your information with third parties.
feature_opensource_desc: Fully transparent code. Review the code yourself to verify your privacy is protected.
feature_interact_desc: Simple and easy-to-use interface. Follow users, ask questions, and interact with the community.
opensource_desc: PemBlle is fully open source. You can view, review, and contribute to the code. We believe in transparency - see exactly how your data is handled and verify that your privacy is truly protected.

privacy_subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy_intro_content: Welcome to PemBlle. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our platform. This policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.
privacy_data_collect_content:
• Account Information: Email address, username, and encrypted password when you register.
• Profile Information: Optional display name, bio, and avatar that you choose to provide.
• Usage Data: Anonymous messages (tells) you send and receive, and answers you post publicly.
• Technical Data: Basic server logs for security and performance purposes.
privacy_data_use_content:
• To provide and maintain our service
• To notify you about changes to our service
• To allow you to participate in interactive features
• To provide customer support
• To detect, prevent and address technical issues
• We never sell your personal data to third parties
privacy_data_protection_content:
• All passwords are encrypted using industry-standard hashing algorithms
• We use HTTPS to encrypt data in transit
• Database access is restricted and monitored
• We regularly review our security practices
• Anonymous tells are designed to protect sender identity
privacy_third_party_content:
• We do not share your personal information with third parties except as required by law
• We do not use third-party analytics that track individual users
• Any external links are clearly marked and subject to their own privacy policies
privacy_data_deletion_content:
• You can delete your account at any time
• Upon account deletion, your personal data will be permanently removed
• Some anonymized data may be retained for security purposes
• You can request a copy of your data by contacting us
privacy_contact_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our GitHub repository or reach out to the developer directly.
privacy_opensource_content: PemBlle is fully open source. You can review our entire codebase to verify exactly how your data is handled and stored.
terms_subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

• You are responsible for safeguarding your password

terms_content_content:

• You agree not to post content that is illegal, offensive, or violates rights
• We reserve the right to remove any content at our discretion
terms_conduct_content:

• Spamming or sending unsolicited messages is not allowed
• Impersonating others or providing false information is forbidden
• Attempting to interfere with the service's security is prohibited
terms_safety_content:
